LECTURE SCHEDULE

Lecture
Week (dates) M W
Unit 1: Dynamics of unstructured populations
1 (Jan. 6 & 8) Intro to WILD3810 Abundance
2 (Jan. 13 & 15) Abundance (continued) Density-independent population growth
3 (Jan. 20 & 22) MLK Holiday - no class Stochastic population dynamics
4 (Jan. 27 & 29) Density-dependent population growth Dynamics of small populations
5 (Feb. 3 & 5) Guest lecture - scientific writing Exam 1
Unit 2: Dynamics of structured populations
6 (Feb. 10 & 12) Review Exam 1 Life tables
7 (Feb. 17 & 19) President’s Day - no class Life-history diversity
8 (Feb. 24 & 26) Survival estimation Buffer
9 (Mar. 2 & 4) Spring break - no class Spring break - no class
10 (Mar. 9 & 11) Age-structured dynamics Matrix models
11 (Mar. 16 & 18) Sensitivity and elasticity Life history strategies
12 (Mar. 23 & 25) Exam 2 Review exam 2
Unit 3: Spatial dynamics
13 (Mar. 30 & Arp. 1) Metapopulation dynamics Source-sink dynamics
14 (Apr. 6 & 8) Occupancy Buffer
Unit 4: Species interactions
15 (Apr. 13 & 15) Competition Predator-prey dynamics
16 (Apr. 20 & 22) Harvest dynamics No class
